name: Point: Color C0De
description:
My best attempt at a zero-dimensional game.

Find the color!

At the beginning of each round, a color will be displayed to you. You have three seconds to memorize the color, before having to match it yourself. Use the left/right arrow keys to change the hue, and up/down arrows to change the brightness. There is a small margin of error you are allowed to have with your color still counting as a match.
